revised_title: On the Law of Partial Polarization of Light by Reflexion: A Study of David Brewster's Experiments
tldr: This article by David Brewster explores the law of partial polarization of light by reflection. Brewster's experiments demonstrate how the angle of incidence and the angle of refraction affect the polarization of light. He also discusses the application of this law to various materials and the phenomenon of polarization in different colors of light. The findings provide a better understanding of the behavior of light and its polarization in different scenarios.
